description.name: usdcarbitrum
description.tagline: USD Coin (Native) arbitrum Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto arbitrum-usdc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept USD Coin (Native) arbitrum directly on your website
Unique arbitrum/usdc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your arbitrum/usdc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
